programs.programDescription: The Youth Civic Engagement Program (YCEP) equips Seattle high school students with skills to drive powerful change in their communities through policy and advocacy experiences.
programs.activityDescription: Participants will learn about local government and the legislative process, receive mentorship, write an advocacy letter about an issue they care about, meet elected representatives, gain leadership and advocacy skills, and have fun.
programs.dates: February 22, March 22, April 26, May 17, with a final in-person session in June or July
